code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function InventoryList(){const[inventory,setInventory]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch("http://localhost:8001/inventory/").then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setInventory(data));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Inventory"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:inventory.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[item.product_name,": ",item.stock," units available"]},item.id))})]});}export default InventoryList;
